findings.message:
SmartBillions.invest(address) (smart_billions.sol#399-431) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- walletBalance += (investing * 5 / 100) * 2 (smart_billions.sol#416)
findings.name: divide-before-multiply

findings.message:
SmartBillions.commitDividend(address) (smart_billions.sol#459-478) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- share = balances[_who] * 0xffffffff / totalSupply (smart_billions.sol#468)
	- balance += share * dividends[last] (smart_billions.sol#471)
findings.name: divide-before-multiply

findings.message:
SmartBillions.betOf(address) (smart_billions.sol#513-535) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (player.value == 0) || (player.blockNum <= 1) || (block.number < player.blockNum) || (block.number >= player.blockNum + (10 * hashesSize)) (smart_billions.sol#515-518)
findings.name: incorrect-equality

findings.message:
SmartBillions.betOf(address) (smart_billions.sol#513-535) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- hash == 0x1000000 (smart_billions.sol#527)
findings.name: incorrect-equality

findings.message:
SmartBillions.putHash() (smart_billions.sol#735-756) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lastb == 0 || block.number <= lastb + 10 (smart_billions.sol#737)
findings.name: incorrect-equality

findings.message:
SmartBillions.addHashes(uint256) (smart_billions.sol#672-689) uses a dangerous strict equality:

findings.name: incorrect-equality

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected hash = uint24(block.blockhash(player.blockNum)) (smart_billions.sol#560):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected playSystem(uint256(sha3()(msg.sender,block.number)),address(0)) (smart_billions.sol#618):
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected ((uint256(block.blockhash(_lastb)) & 0xFFFFFF) | ((uint256(block.blockhash(_lastb + 1)) & 0xFFFFFF) << 24) | ((uint256(block.blockhash(_lastb + 2)) & 0xFFFFFF) << 48) | ((uint256(block.blockhash(_lastb + 3)) & 0xFFFFFF) << 72) | ((uint256(block.blockhash(_lastb + 4)) & 0xFFFFFF) << 96) | ((uint256(block.blockhash(_lastb + 5)) & 0xFFFFFF) << 120) | ((uint256(block.blockhash(_lastb + 6)) & 0xFFFFFF) << 144) | ((uint256(block.blockhash(_lastb + 7)) & 0xFFFFFF) << 168) | ((uint256(block.blockhash(_lastb + 8)) & 0xFFFFFF) << 192) | ((uint256(block.blockhash(_lastb + 9)) & 0xFFFFFF) << 216) | ((uint256(_delta) / hashesSize) << 240)) (smart_billions.sol#700-719):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected (betPrize(player,uint24(block.blockhash(player.blockNum)))) (smart_billions.sol#523):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected playSystem(uint256(sha3()(msg.sender,block.number)),_partner) (smart_billions.sol#626):
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.13 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder
	- ZeroFunctionSelector
	- DelegateCallReturnValue
	- ECRecoverMalformedInput.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.13 (smart_billions.sol#7)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
Reentrancy in SmartBillions.playSystem(uint256,address) (smart_billions.sol#633-664):
	External calls:
	- won() (smart_billions.sol#634)
		- msg.sender.transfer(_amount) (smart_billions.sol#372)
		- msg.sender.transfer(maxpay) (smart_billions.sol#382)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bets[msg.sender] = Bet({value:uint192(msg.value),betHash:uint32(bethash),blockNum:uint32(hashNext)}) (smart_billions.sol#659)
	- dividends[dividendPeriod] += msg.value / 20 (smart_billions.sol#639)
	- hashBetSum = msg.value (smart_billions.sol#648)
	- hashBetSum = msg.value (smart_billions.sol#653)
	- hashBetSum += msg.value (smart_billions.sol#656)
	- putHash() (smart_billions.sol#662)
		- hashLast = lastb + 10 (smart_billions.sol#754)
	- hashNext = block.number + 3 (smart_billions.sol#647)
	- hashNext ++ (smart_billions.sol#652)
	- putHash() (smart_billions.sol#662)
		- hashes[delta % hashesSize] = calcHashes(uint32(lastb),uint32(delta)) (smart_billions.sol#753)
	- walletBalance += fee (smart_billions.sol#643)
	- wallets[_partner].balance += uint208(fee) (smart_billions.sol#644)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- LogBet(msg.sender,uint256(bethash),hashNext,msg.value) (smart_billions.sol#660)
findings.name: reentrancy-unlimited-gas

findings.message:
Reentrancy in SmartBillions.coldStore(uint256) (smart_billions.sol#316-324):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_amount) (smart_billions.sol#322)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- coldStoreLast = block.number (smart_billions.sol#323)
findings.name: reentrancy-unlimited-gas

findings.message:
Reentrancy in SmartBillions.invest(address) (smart_billions.sol#399-431):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value.sub(investing)) (smart_billions.sol#407)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[msg.sender] += senderBalance (smart_billions.sol#423)
	- balances[owner] += ownerBalance (smart_billions.sol#424)
	- balances[animator] += animatorBalance (smart_billions.sol#425)
	- totalSupply += senderBalance + ownerBalance + animatorBalance (smart_billions.sol#426)
	- walletBalance += investing / 10 (smart_billions.sol#413)
	- walletBalance += (investing * 5 / 100) * 2 (smart_billions.sol#416)
	- wallets[owner].balance += uint208(investing / 10) (smart_billions.sol#414)
	- wallets[owner].balance += uint208(investing * 5 / 100) (smart_billions.sol#417)
	- wallets[_partner].balance += uint208(investing * 5 / 100) (smart_billions.sol#418)
	- wallets[msg.sender].lastDividendPeriod = uint16(dividendPeriod) (smart_billions.sol#419)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- LogInvestment(msg.sender,_partner,investing) (smart_billions.sol#430)
	- Transfer(address(0),msg.sender,senderBalance) (smart_billions.sol#427)
	- Transfer(address(0),owner,ownerBalance) (smart_billions.sol#428)
	- Transfer(address(0),animator,animatorBalance) (smart_billions.sol#429)
findings.name: reentrancy-unlimited-gas

findings.message:
Reentrancy in SmartBillions.pay(uint256) (smart_billions.sol#369-384):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_amount) (smart_billions.sol#372)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- houseKeeping() (smart_billions.sol#374)
		- dividendPeriod ++ (smart_billions.sol#349)
	- houseKeeping() (smart_billions.sol#374)
		- dividends.push(0) (smart_billions.sol#346)
	- houseKeeping() (smart_billions.sol#374)
		- investStart = 0 (smart_billions.sol#340)
findings.name: reentrancy-unlimited-gas
